0.10.name: wordpress/image-pro-wordpress-image-media-management-and-resizing-done-right
0.10.description:
First thing first: A video is worth 1000 words. Check out (2 minutes): http://www.mihaivalentin.com/image-pro-wordpress-image-management/

Goal of this plugin: Simplify the WordPress upload and image insert process as much as possible.

Using ImagePro, you can:

  • upload of multiple files directly from your desktop
  • perform smooth image resize (a perfect resize is created based on your resized picture in the editor)
  • easily manage the media collection (search, filter by file type)
  • drag and drop any image to the post and have it resized the way you want
